hero.headline: Your Menu, Reimagined for the Digital Age
hero.subheadline: A responsive, mobile-first menu that delights customers and drives orders directly to your kitchen. No apps to install, just scan and order.

features.title: Stunning Visual Menu
features.description: Showcase your food with high-quality images and detailed descriptions. Filter by Veg/Non-Veg, categories, and allergens.

features.title: Seamless Ordering Experience
features.description: Turn browsers into buyers. Customers can customize items, add variants, and place orders directly from their phone.

features.title: Smart Logistics & Feedback
features.description: Handle delivery costs automatically and gather valuable customer feedback instantly.

reviews.author: Sarah Jenkins
reviews.text: Cravings transformed how we handle orders during rush hour. The digital menu is a lifesaver!

reviews.author: David Chen
reviews.text: The best investment we made this year. Customers love scanning the code and ordering directly.

reviews.author: Emily Rodriguez
reviews.text: Insanely easy to update. We change our specials daily and it takes seconds.

reviews.author: Michael Chang
reviews.text: Inventory management is finally under control. We cut wastage by 20% in the first month.

reviews.author: Priya Patel
reviews.text: Marketing tools are powerful. The automated campaigns brought back so many old customers.

faq.question: Does it work on all devices?
faq.answer: Yes, our digital menu is a responsive web app that works perfectly on all mobile phones, tablets, and desktops without any downloads.

faq.question: Can I customize the colors?
faq.answer: Absolutely. You can choose your brand colors and fonts to ensure the menu matches your restaurant's identity.

faq.question: How do I receive orders?
faq.answer: Orders can be sent directly to your WhatsApp, or integrated into our POS/Kitchen display system.

cta.title: Ready to digitize your restaurant?
cta.description: Join thousands of restaurants using Cravings to serve customers better.
